title: FreeBSD 7.0-RELEASE i386 All-in-One DVD (not 5 CD's)
description:
*************************************  IMPORTANT  *********************************


This torrent is not an official released version.  This is a custom remastered DVD based from extracting and recombining 4 individual CD\&#039;s.  I have put disc1, disc2, disc3, AND the docs CD\&#039;s into this 1 custom compilation because the trouble of switching the CD\&#039;s in and out has grown too darn stupid.  Therefore I put all packages and installable released material on one DVD totalling 1.7 GB and you NEVER have to switch the DVD out like the CD\&#039;s.  Which if you\&#039;ve installed FreeBSD 7.0-RELEASE non-standard install, it is absolute horror in juggling discs.


This is my own solution from that trouble, and I posted it here for others to also benefit from my trouble, and I will hope you keep your sanity while installing FreeBSD 7.0 from my DVD instead of 4 separate CD\&#039;s and switching them ~60 times throughout installation.

I Have deemed 1 DVD much more economical, sane, and efficient, as you do not need 5 discs to install, and it is available offline if you need, compared to using the boot-only minimal CD as a single installation disc.

I will also mention I did not modify the install or customize it in ANY way, it is entirely unmodified and is exactly equivalent of the official released install of 7.0.

I hope you enjoy this creation, as it has saved my sanity of such a horrible installation routine ever again.  Lets hope the core FreeBSD release team releases a DVD either soon or with 7.1-RELEASE :)
